nodes.text: This Imperial major was affected to the Chimaera during Thrawn campaign and served under Grand Admiral Thrawn. He led the strike team which landed on Myrkr to capture Luke Skywalker. His stormtroopers eventually caught him in the Great Northern Forest. When capturing Luke, he noted the latter's deformities, and mentioned they've got a fully qualified medic to fix Luke up.
The major was later killed when Skywalker and Mara Jade were rescued by Lando Calrissian and Talon Karrde's smugglers in Hyllyard City.
